author: camolezi
body:
#### PR description:
Replaced boost library use for C++ STL alternatives. The code should have the same behavior. 

#### PR validation:
Passed on basic runTheMatrix test.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

title: Reduce boost dependency in AnalysisAlgos/SiStripClusterInfoProducer
